meanings.definition: A print made from a woodcut.
meanings.sent1: I saw a beautiful xylograph of a forest scene at the art gallery.
meanings.sent2: The xylograph displayed intricate details of the tree bark.
meanings.sent3: The xylograph of the tree looked so real, I almost tried to touch it!
meanings.sent4: Her xylograph of the mountain landscape was a masterpiece of precision and artistry.
meanings.sent5: The xylograph captured the essence of nature with its detailed print.

meanings.sent1: The artist used a xylograph to create a unique design on the paper.
meanings.sent2: I learned how to make a xylograph in my art class last week.
meanings.sent3: The xylograph of the flower looked like a work of magic on the canvas.
meanings.sent4: His xylograph of the city skyline was a bold statement of urban life.
meanings.sent5: The xylograph revealed the artist's skill in carving intricate patterns.
